A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie made Star Wars seem small. They were far too busy making cheap jokes (of a Gaurdians of the Galaxy variety\, not Han's smooth one-liners from the original) to worry about making a movie that felt like Star Wars. This was exacerbated by how they pushed their many-faceted social justice agenda-issues that I am for\, to be clear\, but that felt forced and out of place and even slightly ridiculous in this film.
